findings.title: Integer Divisions in Solidity might truncate
findings.description: Performing division before multiplication might lead to a loss of precision.

findings.title: External Visibility should be preferred
findings.description: Functions that are never called throughout the contract should be marked as external visibility instead of public visibility.

findings.title: OPERATOR_ROLE is initialized but never assigned to any specific address
findings.description: The AccessLevel contract initializes the Operator Role at Line 7, but it was found that this role has not been set up or assigned to any specific address and the Operator Role is never used throughout the contract.

findings.title: Precision Loss in Division and Multiplication
findings.description: Performing multiplication on the result of division can lead to precision loss due to integer truncation in Solidity.
